31#include "mech_locl.h"
32
33/**
34 * Wrap a message using either confidentiality (encryption +
35 * signature) or sealing (signature).
36 *
37 * @param minor_status minor status code.
38 * @param context_handle context handle.
39 * @param conf_req_flag if non zero, confidentiality is requestd.
40 * @param qop_req type of protection needed, in most cases it GSS_C_QOP_DEFAULT should be passed in.
41 * @param input_message_buffer messages to wrap
42 * @param conf_state returns non zero if confidentiality was honoured.
43 * @param output_message_buffer the resulting buffer, release with gss_release_buffer().
44 *
45 * @ingroup gssapi
46 */
47
48GSSAPI_LIB_FUNCTION OM_uint32 GSSAPI_LIB_CALL
49gss_wrap(OM_uint32 *minor_status,
50 gss_const_ctx_id_t context_handle,
51 int conf_req_flag,
52 gss_qop_t qop_req,
53 const gss_buffer_t input_message_buffer,
54 int *conf_state,
55 gss_buffer_t output_message_buffer)
56{
57 struct _gss_context *ctx = (struct _gss_context *) context_handle;
58 gssapi_mech_interface m;
59
60 if (conf_state)
61 *conf_state = 0;
62 _mg_buffer_zero(output_message_buffer);
63 if (ctx == NULL) {
64 *minor_status = 0;
65 return GSS_S_NO_CONTEXT;
66 }
67
68 m = ctx->gc_mech;
69
70 return (m->gm_wrap(minor_status, ctx->gc_ctx,
71 conf_req_flag, qop_req, input_message_buffer,
72 conf_state, output_message_buffer));
73}
74
